#summary A compendium of resources for developers who want to enhance Longhouse.
#labels LonghouseVersion-0.1

The Longhouse development team appreciates any and all interest in further developing and enhancing Longhouse. Please see the links below to find guides for specific ways of developing for Longhouse.

To learn basic information on how to add new pages, see [ExtendingLonghouse extending Longhouse].

To learn how to package Longhouse for a public release, see [Releasing releasing Longhouse].

To learn how to manipulate the business objects, or how the yamltobo script works, see [NewBusinessObject  business objects].

Are you interested in joining the [http://longhouse.googlecode.com Longhouse Google Code project]? Check back later - after June 15th we'll be adding new project members.
